info.title: SMRT Link Analysis Services for SMRT Link 4.1.0

get.description: Get the SMRT Link System Status containing system metadata, such as SL System Id, uptime and status message.

default.description: Failed to get Server status likely means the server is down

get.description: Get a list of all registered bundles (active or inactive) in the system

default.description: Unable to get bundle service. Bundle service is down

post.description: Add a new bundle to the system from a URL that points to a tgz file

default.description: Unable to download bundle or bundle is malformed

200.description: Returns a PacBio Data Bundle that was successfully added to the registry

get.description: Get a list of all registered bundles by bundle type (active or inactive) in the system

default.description: Unable to find any PacBio Data Bundle(s) with provide bundle type

200.description: List of PacBio Data Bundles for provide bundle type

get.description: Get the PacBio Data bundle that is active for provided bundle type

default.description: Unable to find any PacBio Data Bundle(s) with provide bundle type

200.description: Get the currently Active PacBio Data Bundle for a given bundle type

get.description: Get the a data file from an Active PacBio Data Bundle for a given bundle type. The mimetype will be inferred from the file extension

parameters.description: URL encoded Relative Path to file in the bundle. For example 'SampleCalculatorParams.json' or 'definitions/PacBioAutomationConstraints.xml'
parameters.name: relativePath

default.description: Unable to find any PacBio Data Bundle(s) with provide bundle type. Or relative Path doesn't exist in bundle

200.description: Get the currently Active PacBio Data Bundle for a given bundle type. Returns Null if no bundle is provided

get.description: Get the PacBio Data bundle that is most recent version for provided bundle type

default.description: Unable to find any PacBio Data Bundle(s) with provide bundle type

200.description: List of PacBio Data Bundles for provide bundle type

get.description: Get a PacBio Data Bundle by Id (bundleType, bundleVersion)

parameters.description: Bundle version (e.g., 1.2.3) This should adhere to the Semantic Version scheme
parameters.name: bundleVersion

default.description: Unable to find PacBio Data Bundle for bundle type and bundle version provided

get.description: Download a PacBio Data Bundle TGZ by Id (bundleType, bundleVersion)

parameters.description: Bundle version (e.g., 1.2.3) This should adhere to the Semantic Version scheme
parameters.name: bundleVersion

default.description: Unable to find PacBio Data Bundle for bundle type and bundle version provided

post.description: Upgrade (i.e., 'Activate') a specific Data Bundle by Id (bundleType, bundleVersion). This will mark the bundle as Active and mark other Data bundles as inActive

parameters.description: Bundle version (e.g., 1.2.3) This should adhere to the Semantic Version scheme
parameters.name: bundleVersion

default.description: Unable to find PacBio Data Bundle for bundle type and bundle version provided

200.description: Returns an Activated PacBio Data Bundle

post.description: Upgrade (i.e., 'Activate') a specific Data Bundle by Id (bundleType, bundleVersion). This will mark the bundle as Active and mark other Data bundles as inActive

parameters.description: Bundle version (e.g., 1.2.3) This should adhere to the Semantic Version scheme
parameters.name: bundleVersion

default.description: Unable to find PacBio Data Bundle for bundle type and bundle version provided

200.description: Returns an Activated PacBio Data Bundle

get.description: Check for an upgrade for a specific PacBio Bundle type version

default.description: Unable to find PacBio Data Bundle with type `bundleType`

200.description: PacBid Data Bundle Upgrade. If null, there is no upgrade available

get.description: Get a Summary of each DataSet MetaType. Each model will have the 'short' name of the DataSet MetaType that is accessible at datasets/{ds-metatype}
Either the DataSet Metatype (e.g, subreads to return a list of Datasets by metadata type) or Int or UUID for DataSet to get a DataSet Service MetaData for the requested dataset.

parameters.description: Either the DataSet Metatype or DataSet Int or UUID for the PacBio DataSet.
parameters.name: typeOrId

parameters.description: Either the DataSet Metatype or DataSet Int or UUID for the PacBio DataSet.
parameters.name: typeOrId

get.description: Get DataSet Meta Type
Returns JSON converted from the DataSet XML. See the PacBio DataSet XSDs for details

200.description: JSON structure for the given DataSet type (e.g., SubreadSet, ReferenceSet)

get.description: Get the Service AlignmentSet Metadata
Get the Service HdfSubreadSet Metadata
Get the Service SubreadSet Metadata
Get the Service BarcodeSet Metadata
Get the Service CCSAlignmentSet Metadata
Get the Service ContigSet Metadata
Get the Service CCS ReadSet Metadata
Get the Service ReferenceSet Metadata
Get the Service GmapReferenceSet Metadata
Get the reports associated with a PacBio DataSet. These will often contain num records, total length and filter stats. The reports generated are dependent on the DataSet MetaType (e.g., SubreadSet)
Get a list of projects

put.description: Update the project with the given ID; omitted attributes result in no change to that attribute's value

get.description: Retrieve the project with the given ID

delete.description: Delete the project with the given ID

get.description: Get a list of Resolved Pipeline Templates registered to SMRT Link
Get a Resolved Pipeline Template by Ids
Get a List of Presets for a specific Resolved Pipeline Template
Report View Rules that override the default view rule for report by type id
Get a Pipeline Template View Rule by id
Get a list of job types registered to the SMRT Link System. This can be accessible at job-managers/jobs/{job-type}

post.description: Start a pbsmrtpipe job using one or more dataset entry points
Import a PacBio DataSet XML and generate associated reports
Generate a PacBio ReferenceSet XML (including required index files) from a FASTA file

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Import reference FASTA job options object

post.description: Generate a PacBio BarcodeSet XML from a FASTA file

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Import barcode FASTA job options object

post.description: Convert RS II movie metadata XML to an HdfSubreadSet suitable for pbsmrtpipe input

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Import RS II movie job options object

post.description: Combine two or more SubreadSets (or HdfSubreadSets) into a single dataset
Create a ZIP file containing the contents of one or more datasets, including external resource files
Remove a dataset from the database and delete external resource files
Remove a job from the database and delete output directory contents
Import all files in a datastore JSON
Send a request to PacBio Tech Support for assistance with a failed job (request will include job details and log files)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Tech support failed job bundle options object

post.description: Send a summary of SMRT Link system status to PacBio Tech Support

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Tech support system status bundle options object

post.description: Save a local backup copy of the SMRT Link Postgres database

get.description: Get a Service DataStore File by DataStoreFile UUID
Get a list of Events associated with a specific Job
Get a list of sub-computation units (i.e., a task)

200.description: Return a list of JobTask instances

parameters.description: Job Type Id (e.g., pbsmrtpipe, merge-datasets, import-datasets
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Job Id as Int or UUID
parameters.name: job-id

put.description: Update the state of Job subtask

parameters.description: Job Type Id (e.g., pbsmrtpipe, merge-datasets, import-datasets
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Job Id as Int or UUID
parameters.name: job-id

parameters.description: Task Globally unique identifier as a UUID
parameters.name: task-uuid

get.description: Get Job subtask by task UUID

default.description: Failed to find Job Id, task UUID or job type

parameters.description: Job Type Id (e.g., pbsmrtpipe, merge-datasets, import-datasets
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Job Id as Int or UUID
parameters.name: job-id

parameters.description: Task Globally unique identifier as a UUID
parameters.name: task-uuid

get.description: Get the options used to created the Job. The returned model will depend on job-type
Get a list of Children jobs of this parent job
Get the PacBio DataStore associated with a specific Job by Job Id or UUID
Get a PacBio Report by UUID from a SMRT Link Job. If the Job type or job id doesn't exist, a 404 will be returned
Get a list of ServiceReport files generated from a job
Get a job by Integer ID or UUID

default.description: Error Message. Unable to find job or job type is invalid

200.description: Returns a SMRT Link Service Job

parameters.description: Job id and Integer or UUID
parameters.name: job-id

post.description: Terminate a running pbsmrtpipe analysis job

get.description: Get the DataSet Entry Points used as inputs to the Job (if any were provided)

DiskSpace.title: SMRT Server Disk Space
DiskSpace.description: An summary of the SMRT Server disk usage.

path.title: Server Path
path.description: Path to base directory of SMRT Server

totalSpace.title: Total Space
totalSpace.description: Total disk Space available for SMRT Server directory (e.g., job directory, tmp space, root dir)

usableSpace.title: Usable Disk Space
usableSpace.description: Total free disk space available for SMRT Server

freeSpace.title: Free Disk Space
freeSpace.description: Total free disk space available for SMRT Server
